title: UNFAIR BAN
body: I was playing a game it was like 5 mins in and I had to go out and buy something so when I came back after like 4-5 mins it showed that 'u need to become active if u don't wanna get banned by the tribunal system" or something like that and I started playing at that point and after the match I STILL GOT THE LOW PRIORITY BAN I don't think this is fair do I even deserve the ban ?

replies.body:
oh ok I guess I deserved it

time management ? HOW THE HELL WILL I KNOW WHEN MY MOM COMES IN AND ASKS TO ME TO GET STUFF anyways I should have asked 
 
THANKS FOR CLEARING IT TO ME

because you went afk and your teammates reported you for afk.


Just to buy something? yea you deserved it.

Yes. I can sympathize with someone leaving for an emergency or something that is beyond your control like an internet or power failure. But AFKing because "you had to buy something"? That is just bad planning on your part. 

If you start a game of league, make sure you can actually sit down for at least 40 minutes. Don't screw over your team because you have horrible time management.
